title: Fox Fire Ahri
body: hello, i am posting this article because i would like to get feedback on an idea that I have asked riot employees about. I am focusing on fox fire Ahri in this, and the reason I am posting this is because in this skin the orb that Ahri uses as her weapon is blue just like in her default skin however given that the other colors used throughout fox fire Ahri are all orange including the colors of her w and the projectiles fired from her ult what I am suggesting is that her orb be changed to an orange color that would better suit the color schemes used throughout the skin, and also I know that it hasn't been changed in her other skins however in her new skin the orb is pink so why not make this one orange. {{champion:103}}

replies.body: Yes! I'm an Ahri main and this has always bugged me, please change this!{{champion:103}}
Yes, that is a really good idea!{{champion:103}}

The orb is actually blue as a reference to the fire fox web browser (a fox around around a blue globe) the orb being the globe the orange fox is curled around. So... I think it should not be changed, as I like this reference, and anyway it doesn't _really_ ruin the skin at all
